articles.author: Jose Garcia
articles.title: Don't Expect Starfield-Level Freedom In Star Wars Outlaws - DualShockers
articles.description: Star Wars Outlaws will be a bit more restrictive, but also deliberate, with its traversal and exploration.
articles.content: One of the more exciting announcements of the recent Summer Game Fest season was the reveal of Ubisoft's upcoming open-world (or perhaps open-galaxy) Star Wars game, Star Wars Outlaws, and a recent i… [+2063 chars]
